name: Ennis, Inc.
description: Ennis, Inc. is a leading manufacturer and supplier of printed business products and services, headquartered in Midlothian, Texas. Established in 1909, the company has a rich history of innovation and quality in the printing industry. Ennis primarily operates through its subsidiaries, providing a diverse range of products that include custom printed business forms, checks, labels, and promotional items. The company serves a wide array of sectors, including educational institutions, healthcare, finance, and retail, ensuring that their clients have the tools they need for efficient operations. Ennis is committed to sustainability, employing eco-friendly practices in its manufacturing processes and offering products that help businesses reduce their environmental impact. With a customer-centric approach, Ennis focuses on delivering exceptional service and high-quality products to meet the unique needs of its clientele. The company also emphasizes technological advancements in the printing process, integrating digital solutions to enhance productivity and product offerings. Ennis, Inc. is publicly traded on the New York Stock Exchange under the ticker symbol EBF, showcasing its commitment to transparency and accountability to its shareholders.

seo.meta_title: Ennis, Inc. | Leading Manufacturer of Printed Business Products
seo.meta_description: Learn about Ennis, Inc., a top manufacturer of printed business products, committed to quality, innovation, and sustainability in the printing industry.

faq.question: What products does Ennis, Inc. offer?
faq.answer: Ennis offers a variety of products including custom printed business forms, checks, labels, and promotional items.

faq.question: Where is Ennis, Inc. headquartered?
faq.answer: Ennis, Inc. is headquartered in Midlothian, Texas, USA.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Ennis, Inc.?
faq.answer: The CEO of Ennis, Inc. is Keith W. O'Neal.

faq.question: What industries does Ennis serve?
faq.answer: Ennis serves a variety of industries, including education, healthcare, finance, and retail.
